Method Detail

isLike

public static boolean isLike(String string,
                             String customMask,
                             boolean ignoreCase,
                             LikeConfiguration config)
Checks if the string matches with the mask or not.

Parameters:
string - the comparable string.
customMask - the mask which the string is compared to.
ignoreCase - whether to compare the string and mask case insensitive.
config - Like configuration.
Returns:
true if the string matches with the mask.

isStartsWith

public static boolean isStartsWith(String string,
                                   String customMask,
                                   boolean ignoreCase,
                                   LikeConfiguration config)
Checks whether given string starts with given customMask using regular expression.

Parameters:
string - The string to check
customMask - The mask that must match
ignoreCase - Specifies the case sensitivity of the match.
config - Configuration of the expression.
Returns:
true, if given string starts with given customMask
Since:
1.1.3

                                 String customMask,
                                 boolean ignoreCase,
                                 LikeConfiguration config)
Checks whether given string ends with given customMask using regular expression.

Parameters:
string - The string to check.
customMask - The mask that must match.
ignoreCase - Specifies the case sensitivity of the match.
config - Configuration of the expression.
Returns:
true, if given string ends with given customMask
Since:
